trans-unit.source: The abstract base class from which workflow roles are derived.
trans-unit.target: A classe base abstrata da qual fluxo de trabalho funções são derivadas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] You can derive classes from the WorkflowRole class in order to implement role-based access to your workflows and their activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Você pode derivar as classes da classe WorkflowRole para implementar o acesso baseado em função para seus fluxos de trabalho e suas atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> class and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class derive from the WorkflowRole class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>classe e a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>classe derivada da classe WorkflowRole.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class gets the identities contained by this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada obtém as identidades contidas <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A list of the names of the identities contained by this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista dos nomes das identidades contidas por essa <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether this role contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, retorna um valor que indica se essa função contém a identidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity for which to test.
trans-unit.target: O nome da identidade para o qual o teste.

trans-unit.source: if identity is included in this ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if identity is included in this ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the name of this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o nome deste <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole"> </xref>.
